{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1251\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1049{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset204 Roboto Condensed;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset238 Roboto Condensed;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset0 Roboto Condensed;}}

{\*\generator Riched20 10.0.19041}\viewkind4\uc1 
\pard\cf1\f0\fs24 Adjectives---1\par
\par
yasl\f1\u305? kad\u305?n ve genc k\u305?z\f2\lang1033 .\par
Bunlar s\f1\u305?cak, \'baunlar so\u287?uk.\f2  These are hot, those are cold.\par
\f1\'baunlar kolay\f2 . Those are easy.\par
S\f1\u305?cak su i\f2\'e7! Drink hot water!\par
bunlar zor. These are difficult.\par
Gen\'e7 k\f1\u305?z bir elma yer.\f2  The young girl eats an apple.\par
\f1\'aau ekmek\f2 . That is bread.\par
\f1\'aau elma \f2\'e7ok b\'fcy\'fck. That apple is very big.\par
\f1\'baunlar kolay\f2 .  Those are easy.\par
Ekmek \'e7ok s\f1\u305?cak.\f2  The bread is very hot.\par
Bunlar k\'fc\'e7\'fck ve \f1\'baunlar b\f2\'fcy\'fck. These are small and those are big.\par
bu \'e7ok kolay. This is very easy.\par
zor bir \'e7oc\'fck. A difficult child.\par
\f0\lang1049\par
}
